pages.text: Rennet is the basis of making cheese. Rennet is made using the Brew Kettle by boiling either mushrooms, cow stomach, or thistle.$(br2)The amount of rennet produced depends on the ingredients.
$(br2)Brown or Red Mushrooms$(li)125mb Rennet$(br2)Cow Stomach$(li)1000mb Rennet$(br2)Thistle$(li)125mb Rennet
